{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Norton |model=Core |revision=517 |series=AC2600 |asin=B06Y2B4NWY |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U05I001 |manuf_rev=CT00 |price=280 |fcc_date=04/18/2017 |fcc_id=2AI6F-517 |pcb_id=EWZ510-A1-SN-115 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065;IPQ8065, 0VV, FK623BNP, K062300; |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM4G1FEPD |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 5-pin header |wi1_module=Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-2G-025(XC) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NK6332FN, K063300; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-5G-025(AC) |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NK626PSF, K062600; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PK6354JZ, 1635, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5533LQ;MSC, 5533, 705H;4;,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFPA5542;PA5542, OWON;4;,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, K621B022;1; |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth 4.1, heatsink, fan |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=B4:A9:84 |oui_eth=B4:A9:84 }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Norton Core Secure WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://us.norton.com/core}} {{SupportPage|https://support.norton.com/core}} The [ftp://ftp.symantec.com/public/english_us_canada/products/norton_core_router/manuals/NortonCore_UG.pdf User Guide] says that the CPU is a [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 (@1.7GHz Dual Core) :$9.99/mo subscription after the first year {{See also|Norton Core Mini 318|Norton Core 518}} ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33143-norton-core-router-reviewed ''Norton Core Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"EWZ510-A1-SN-115" and "308.02363.115" is silkscreened on the main board. :"EWZ510-A1-SN-2G-025(XC)" i_ silkscreened on the 2.4GHz wireless module. :"EWZ510-A1-SN-5G-025(AC)" is silkscreened on the 5GHz wireless module. *[https://www.acwifi.net/7857.html ''Norton Core 517 Teardown'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] ([https://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/SAM_4298.jpg internal images]) :OUI: [https://hwaddress.com/?q=B4:A9:84 B4:A9:84] (''Symantec Corporation'') ==Images== File:Norton Core 517 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Norton Core 517 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Norton Core 517 IO Board Top.jpeg|IO Board Top File:Norton Core 517 IO Board Bottom.jpeg|IO Board Bottom File:Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-2G-025(XC).jpeg|2.4G WiFi File:Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-5G-025(AC).jpeg|5G WiFi [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
